alert.note: Alert for Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 12 at 1:23AM PDT until March 15 at 5:00PM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM PDT WEDNESDAY ABOVE 7000 FEET... * WHAT...Another round of heavy snow expected Tuesday into Wednesday above 7000 feet. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 feet between 7000 and 9000 feet. 2 to 4 feet expected above 9000 feet. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Sierra Slopes. * WHEN...Until 5 PM PDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Wet snow will result in heavy loads on roofs, possibly leading to collapses. Heavy snow accumulations could cause tree damage and lead to power outages. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels will rise to around 8000 feet Tuesday before falling below 6000 feet early Wednesday morning. The heaviest snowfall rates are expected on Tuesday.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Sierra Slopes of Inyo County
